Player History
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,104,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/4/1985...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/4/1987, off Jeff Dedmon (ATL)...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,450,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Philadelphia to Detroit on 4/26/1989 (Going to PHI: P Scott Garrelts, SS Austin Manahan, CF Rob Deer. Going to DET: P Steve Bedrosian, P Storm Davis, C Mark Salas)...
6/10/1989: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $2,300,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 8/24/1990 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1992, going 1-1, 0.76...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/12/1993 to a 2-year deal worth $760,000 per year...
